meanings.definition: A type of headgear worn by Muslim men.
meanings.sent1: He proudly wore his jibbahs during the religious ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The jibbahs protected his head from the scorching sun.
meanings.sent3: The jibbahs looked like fluffy clouds resting on his head.
meanings.sent4: His jibbahs were a symbol of his faith and tradition.
meanings.sent5: The colorful jibbahs stood out in the crowd, a beautiful sight.

meanings.definition: The plural form of jibbah, referring to multiple headgear worn by Muslim men.
meanings.sent1: The market displayed a variety of jibbahs for sale.
meanings.sent2: The jibbahs in the shop window caught his eye.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally mixed up the colors of the jibbahs he bought.
meanings.sent4: The jibbahs lined up neatly on the shelf, ready to be worn.
meanings.sent5: The jibbahs added a touch of tradition to the modern fashion show.
